job_description:
Company: MobilePro
Position: Mobile Developer
Location: Los Angeles, CA (Remote)
Salary: $115,000 - $145,000

About Us:
MobilePro is dedicated to providing innovative mobile applications. We are a team of passionate mobile developers and designers.

Job Description:
We are looking for a Mobile Developer to help build and maintain our cross-platform mobile applications. The ideal candidate will have experience with React Native or Flutter.

Responsibilities:
- Develop and maintain mobile applications using React Native.
- Collaborate with designers and product managers to implement new features.
- Write unit and integration tests.
- Troubleshoot and fix bugs.

Requirements:
- 2+ years of experience in mobile development.
- Strong proficiency in React Native.
- Experience with iOS and Android development.
- Familiarity with RESTful APIs.

Preferred Qualifications:
- Experience with Flutter.
- Knowledge of native mobile development (Swift, Kotlin).
- Experience with automated testing frameworks.

Benefits:
- Remote work options.
- Health, dental, and vision insurance.
- Paid time off.
